body_html:
Hi,
I just got the same error, and although it's amazing to see that it has been fixed so quickly, I think my issue coming from a different location.

My line is tf.einsum('mckd,mc->mkd', Kmcmc, w), where Kmcmc.get_shape() evaluates to (?, 8, ?, 8). This causes the same problem in special_math_ops.py#L327. This issue should also exist in special_math_ops.py#L344.

Could the same fix be applied to these situations too?

Hi,

My line is tf.einsum('mckd,mc->mkd', Kmcmc, w), where Kmcmc.get_shape() evaluates to (?, 8, ?, 8). This causes the same problem in special_math_ops.py#L327. This issue should also exist in special_math_ops.py#L344.
Could the same fix be applied to these situations too?
body:
Hi,
I just got the same error, and although it's amazing to see that it has been fixed so quickly, I think my issue coming from a different location.

My line is `tf.einsum('mckd,mc->mkd', Kmcmc, w)`, where `Kmcmc.get_shape()` evaluates to `(?, 8, ?, 8)`. This causes the same problem in [special_math_ops.py#L327](https://github.com/jihunchoi/tensorflow/blob/51b494280777d735607061e27a15b49a7b80d8e9/tensorflow/python/ops/special_math_ops.py#L327). This issue should also exist in [special_math_ops.py#L344](https://github.com/jihunchoi/tensorflow/blob/51b494280777d735607061e27a15b49a7b80d8e9/tensorflow/python/ops/special_math_ops.py#L334).

Could the same fix be applied to these situations too?
